titles.title: Creating Manufacturing Jobs and Promoting Fair Trade Act
To create jobs and promote fair trade by increasing duties on certain foreign goods imported into the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 6/7/2012--Introduced. Creating Manufacturing Jobs and Promoting Fair Trade Act - Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to increase the duty on polyurethane sponges. Prescribes requirements for the duty treatment of steel wool cleaning pads.
